headline: Keurig Dr Pepper buys powdered-drinks business Dyla Brands
summary: The 7Up maker acquired a minority stake in the business in 2017.

raw.headline: Keurig Dr Pepper buys powdered-drinks business Dyla Brands
raw.summary: The 7Up maker acquired a minority stake in the business in 2017.

headline: KDP Q2 Deep Dive: Volume-Led Growth as New Brands Gain Traction, Cost Pressures Loom
summary: Beverage company Keurig Dr Pepper (NASDAQ:KDP) beat Wall Street’s revenue expectations in Q2 CY2025, with sales up 6.1% year on year to $4.16 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $0.49 per share was in line with analysts’ consensus estimates.
